ServerSide

Class DigitalFileSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerSide.DigitalFileSigner

  • class DigitalFileSigner
extends java.lang.Object
    DigitalFileSigner class helps in creating the digital signing mechanism with any data as input meanwhile creating signed data file using asymmetric key (private)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<byte[]> list 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DigitalFileSigner(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String keyFile)
      The constructor of DigitalFileSigner class builds the list that will be written to the file.

      • list

        private java.util.List<byte[]> list

    • Constructor Detail

      • DigitalFileSigner

        private DigitalFileSigner(java.lang.String data,
                          java.lang.String keyFile)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The constructor of DigitalFileSigner class builds the list that will be written to the file. The list consists of the message and the signature.
        Parameters:
        data - as input message to sign
        keyFile - as the encryption key for asymmetric encryption
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if required files are missing

    • Method Detail

             throws java.lang.Exception

        java.lang.Exception

      • getPrivate

        private java.security.PrivateKey getPrivate(java.lang.String filename)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        getPrivate Method to retrieve the Private Key from a file for digital signing
        Parameters:
        filename - as key file
        Returns:
        privateKey
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if file is not found

      • writeToFile

        private void writeToFile()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        writeToFile Method to write the List of byte[] to a file and create the digital sign data file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to create the file
